neocognitron

Class VSCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • neocognitron.VSCell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class VSCell
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The vs-cell contains all the constants needed to propagate a signal correctly for the neocognitron. This is the v-cell which will be part of the s-layer. Additionally, the vs-cell is serializable so that it can be saved for further use.
    Author:
    Nicholas J. Conn
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
